Introduction

Mia is a South Korean singer, dancer, and rapper under Yue Hua Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group EVERGLOW.

Mia was formally unveiled as the second member of EVERGLOW on February 19, 2019. She made her debut with them on March 18, 2019 with the release of their first digital single "Arrival of Everglow", and its title song "Bon Bon Chocolat".
